attributes.action: call upon all prospective parliamentary candidates in the forthcoming General Election and members of the House of Lords to make public their tax records for the last ten years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this petition is to provide the electorate of this country with information about the individuals that seek election to Parliament and members of the House of Lords who both have responsibility for approving UK tax law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
